name: e-commerce
description: - **Navbar**: Create a responsive navbar (logo + (Home, New, Men, Women, contact) ). - **Footer**:  Create a simple responsive footer. - **Home page**:      - Ads section for Men cloths.     - Ads section for Women cloths.     - Section about new arrivals (image, text, button).     - Carousel Products in all categories (men, women, shoes...) - **New page**:     - Products list with filter system and sorting function by Price. - **Men page**:     - two images about men cloths     - products with filter system (sorting optional). - **Women page**:      -Same as men page. - **Contact page**: Normal contcat responsive design.
